headline: Hershey unveils new dream candy combos ahead of Valentine's Day
summary: Many of us remember Valentine's Day from childhood, when we begged our parents to buy oversized bags of candy so we could carefully write "to" and "from" on cards for every classmate. We handed out little treat bags at school, and even if we didn't have a special someone, it didn't matter because ...

headline: Humble Hershey’s Gets a Marketing Makeover
summary: Hershey  wants its 125-year-old, workhorse chocolate brand to work a little harder.  The candy and snacks maker, whose portfolio also includes famous names like Reese’s and Twizzlers, has increased its marketing budget for Hershey’s by 20% to fund the brand’s first new advertising campaign in eight years.  The Hershey Company spent $600 million total on advertising expenses in 2024.
